original: Holdings:
translation: 地产：

original: Total Decadence Contribution:
translation: 总体腐化度：

original: Has a Job:
translation: 接受一个任务：

original: Is on Job Action:
translation: 正在执行任务中：

original: §Y$NAME$§! is on a Pilgrimage
translation: §Y$NAME$§!正在出行

original: As I listened to the Hafiz correctly continue the recitation of a passage taken randomly from the Qur'an, I marveled at the piety of the man. To submit the whole Qur'an to memory, all 114 Surahs, is a feat only the most zealous Muslim could perform.
translation: 当我听说哈菲兹可以准确背诵古兰经里任意一段内容时，我被这个人的虔诚所震惊。铭记古兰经全部的114章内容，是只有最狂热的穆斯林才能做到的壮举！

original: May Allah hear my words, I will memorize the whole Qur'an!
translation: 愿安拉听我所言，我会记住整部古兰经！

original: Marvelous! But it must be such a chore...
translation: 太了不起了！不过这会是一件苦差事……

original: Aspiring Hafiz: committing the Qur'an to memory
translation: 哈菲兹立志传：将古兰经铭记于心

original: I feel nervous as I stand before the imam, waiting for him to choose and start reciting a random passage from the Qur'an which I must then continue reciting correctly. He has chosen:\n\nWhen the Qur'an is read...
translation: 面对伊玛目时，我倍感紧张，等待着他任意挑出古兰经中的一段，然后我必须准确背诵出来。他选了一段：\n\n正在阅读古兰经……

original: ...listen to it with attention and hold your peace that ye may receive Mercy
translation: ……静下心来，认真聆听，这样你方可得到宽恕

original: A Student of Fiqh, Islamic Law
translation: 研究伊斯兰律法的学生

original: A faqih is an expert in 'fiqh' which is knowledge of legislative rulings, pertaining to the actions of man, as derived from their detailed evidences. I have been asked if I would like to study with some of the best fuqaha of [Root.Location.GetName] so that I may one day become one of the greatest jurists of the Islamic world.
translation: 法基赫是专家，精研「费格赫」，即关于立法决议，以及来源于细节证据的人类行为的知识。有人问我是否愿意和[Root.Location.GetName]的法基赫一起学习，以便让我以后能够成为伊斯兰世界最伟大的法学家之一。

original: This is an opportunity I don't dare say 'no' to
translation: 这是一个我不敢拒绝的机会

original: It sounds like an awful lot of work... No, thank you
translation: 听起来真是一项异常繁重的任务……不了，多谢

original: A year of studying fiqh has left my poor head weary. The other faqihs are merciless in their demands, I am to study the Qur'an, the Sunnah, Ijma' (Consensus) and Qiyas (Analogy) to prepare myself for the last exam, then I may call myself a faqih.
translation: 对于费格赫一年的研究已让我可怜的脑袋疲惫不堪。费格赫其余的部分要求也相当严酷，我将要学习古兰经，圣行，伊吉玛（公议）以及格雅斯（类推）来准备我的最终测试，之后我便可以称自己为「法基赫」。

original: I cannot quit now, so close to becoming a faqih...
translation: 我不能就此放弃，离成为一名法基赫只有一步之遥……

original: I give up, this is not the life I want...
translation: 我放弃，这不是我想要的生活……

original: I have finally become an expert in Islamic jurisprudence! My knowledge of the Qur'an, the Sunnah, Ijma' (Consensus) and Qiyas (Analogy) is what makes me a faqih and I will use that knowledge to be a better [Root.GetTitle] and ruler of my people.
translation: 我终于成为一个伊斯兰法学专家！关于古兰经，圣行，伊吉玛（公议）以及格雅斯（类推）的学习，让我成为了一名法基赫，接下来我将要用这些知识使自己成为更优秀的[Root.GetTitle]，并更好的统治我的人民。

original: I am proud to have become a faqih!
translation: 我对自己能成为一名法基赫而感到自豪！

original: I will use the knowledge but not the title
translation: 我要用我的学识而不是我的头衔

original: Realm Size Multiplier:
translation: 领地大小系数：

original: Head of Dynasty Demesne Multiplier:
translation: 家族领袖直辖系数：

original: Gain:
translation: 收益：

original: Gain Reduction:
translation: 收益降低：

original: Monthly Decadence Gain:
translation: 每月腐化度增加：

original: [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] is Trampled by Mob
translation: [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]已被暴民所蹂躏

original: [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] Pockets Charity Money
translation: [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]私吞善款

original: Heathens Attack the [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]
translation: 异教徒攻击[Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]

original: Deus Vult!
translation: 神的旨意！

original: Masha'Allah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: Our armies now stand poised to take part in the [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for the [Root.Location.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName].
translation: 我们的军队正蓄势待发，为了[Root.Location.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]而参加[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]。

original: Free Warrior Lodge
translation: 自由战士营房

original: Free Warrior Lodge
translation: 自由战士营房

original: Free Warrior Lodge
translation: 自由战士营房

original: Free Warrior Lodge
translation: 自由战士营房

original: Invasion of [Title.GetBaseName]
translation: 入侵[Title.GetBaseName]

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ Invasion of $OTHER_TITLE$
translation: $ORDER$ $FIRST_ADJ$入侵$OTHER_TITLE$

original: $FIRST_ADJ$ Invasion of $SECOND$
translation: $FIRST_ADJ$入侵$SECOND$

original: Gain all Holdings owned by $GIVER$ in the $REGION$
translation: 占有$REGION$境内$GIVER$的所有地产

original: Vassalize or take everything held by $GIVER$ in the $REGION$
translation: 附庸或者占有$REGION$境内$GIVER$所拥有的领土

original: These are the terms of your surrender:
translation: 这些是你的投降条款：

original: We propose a White Peace under these terms:
translation: 在这些前提下，我们提出无条件和平：

original: We surrender under these terms:
translation: 根据这些条款，我们投降：

original: Filter
translation: 筛选

original: All
translation: 所有

original: Only Men
translation: 只有男性

original: Filters away all childless women
translation: 排除所有无子女的女性

original: Only Landed
translation: 有头衔

original: Filters away all unlanded characters that have no children
translation: 筛选所有拥有头衔且没有子女的角色

original: Only Alive
translation: 只有在世的

original: Filters away all dead characters that had no children
translation: 排除所有没有子女的已死亡角色

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes the new §Y[This.GetRulerTitle] of [This.GetBaseName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!接管了所有占领的领土。\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!成为§Y[This.GetBaseName]的新[This.GetRulerTitle]§!。\n

original: §Y$WHO$§!: $DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ Prestige from war contribution.\n
translation: §Y$WHO$§!：从战争贡献中$DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ 威望。\n

original: §Y$WHO$§!: $DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ $PIETYNAME$ from war contribution.\n
translation: §Y$WHO$§!：从战争贡献中$DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ $PIETYNAME$。\n

original: Less than §Y$NUM$§! Counties held within the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!所控制的国家少于§Y$NUM$§!

original: At least §Y$NUM$§! Counties held within the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!最少控制§Y$NUM$§!个国家

original: The Sword of Islam
translation: 伊斯兰之剑

original: African Unit Pack
translation: 非洲单位包

original: Songs of the Caliph
translation: 哈里发之歌

original: Subjugated
translation: 被征服

original: Imprisoned my Child
translation: 囚禁了我的子女

original: Executed my Child
translation: 处决了我的子女

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not be imprisoned
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!不能被囚禁

original: Is NOT in revolt
translation: 没有发生暴动

original: Is in revolt
translation: 正在发生暴动

original: [From.GetFirstName] asks 'How can I best serve the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith?'
translation: [From.GetFirstName]问：「我如何才能最好地侍奉 [Root.Religion.GetName]信仰」

original: Be brave against our enemies!
translation: 勇敢地对抗对你的敌人！

original: Be just to all its children
translation: 公正地对待所有的孩子

original: §Y$ABDICATOR$§! abdicates.\n
translation: §Y$ABDICATOR$§!退位了。\n

original: §YChange due to other factors this year:§!\n
translation: §Y由今年其他因素引起的变化§!：\n

original: Events
translation: 事件

original: Title grants
translation: 授予头衔

original: Cannot join an outside attacker against our liege
translation: 无法加入外来者针对我们领主的战争

original: §Y$FEMALE$§! is too old
translation: §Y$FEMALE$§!太老了

original: Since I am Muslim and §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is of my dynasty, only [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] parents might care.
translation: 由于我是一个穆斯林并且§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!属于我的家族，只有[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]父母可能会关心。

original: Since I am Muslim and §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is of my dynasty, only [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] parents might care.
translation: 由于我是一个穆斯林并且§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!属于我的家族，只有[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]父母会在乎。

original: Decadent Relatives
translation: 腐化的亲戚

original: Decadence Change per Month
translation: 每月腐化度变化

original: You have toiled long and hard for your husband, [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], and even given him a son. But he has other sons not of your blood who will one day have designs upon the throne, and your son may be killed as a pretender. Perhaps it would be best to strike first...
translation: 你长久以来一直为你的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]努力工作，甚至为他生了一个儿子。但是他的其他儿子没有你的血脉，他们可能有一天会谋求王位，并且可能将你的儿子作为觊觎者杀死。或许应该先下手为强……

original: One of your wives, [From.GetFirstName], has been caught trying to serve a cup of poisoned tea to one of your sons born by a different wife. Only your son's keen senses revealed the beverage for the vile poison it was before he drank from the cup. It seems her goal is to improve the influence and standing of her own offspring with you...
translation: 你的一位妻子，[From.GetFirstName]，被发现试图毒杀你的另一位妻子生的孩子。幸运的是你的儿子在喝下茶之前察觉出来了。她的目的似乎是提升她自己的孩子在你心中的地位……

original: One of your sons has mysteriously perished after becoming suddenly ill. Though you and your advisors suspect foul play, you have no idea where to place the blame...
translation: 你的一个儿子在暴病之后神秘地死亡了。虽然你和你的顾问们对此深表怀疑，但查不到任何有用的线索……

original: One of your sons has perished after being served a cup of poisoned tea by [From.GetFirstName], your treacherous wife! It seems she murdered him in an effort to improve the influence and standing of her own offspring with you.
translation: 你的一个儿子在喝下你的奸诈的妻子[From.GetFirstName]送来的毒茶之后突然暴毙了！她谋杀他的目的似乎是提升她自己的儿子在你心目中的地位。

original: Bread is shared.
translation: 分享面包。

original: Informed you will not join him.
translation: 告诉他你不会加入他。

original: Head of Dynasty
translation: 家族领袖

original: The ship you are on falls victim to a mighty storm, and you are tossed overboard as it sinks beneath the waves. Together with your followers and a few other survivors, you are washed ashore on a small, deserted island. As a person of rank, it falls on you to distribute what little food you have left.
translation: 你所在的船不幸的遭到了暴风雨，你被波浪冲到了甲板上。你和你的追随者以及其他幸存者漂流到了一个荒芜的小岛上。作为一个高尚的人，你将奉献出你仅有的食物。

original: We will share evenly, as brothers.
translation: 我们会像亲兄弟一样平分。

original: As [Root.GetTitle], my share will be greatest of course.
translation: 作为[Root.GetTitle]，我的份当然是最多的。

original: You share the food evenly with the other survivors.
translation: 你和其他幸存者平分食物。

original: After a few days another ship carrying pilgrims passes nearby, and to everyone's relief their lookout spots your stranded party. Though weakened by the lack of food and water, everyone survives thanks to your decision to share supplies evenly.
translation: 几天之后另一只朝圣船经过这里，并且他们的瞭望哨发现了你的小队。虽然由于缺少水和食物而感到虚弱，但每个人都感激你分享食物的决定。

original: Now we can all continue to Mecca!
translation: 现在我们能继续去麦加了！

original: Most of the supplies are reserved for you.
translation: 大部分的补给为你保留了。

original: After a few days another ship carrying pilgrims passes nearby, and to everyone's relief their lookout spots your stranded party. For some of the survivors it is too late, but at least you are in good health, as, befitting of your great station, the lion's share of water and food has gone to you.
translation: 几天之后一直朝圣船经过了这里，并且他们的发现了你。对一些幸存者而言已经太迟了，但至少你很健康，由于你的地位，最多的水和食物分给了你。

original: Let us pay no heed to this little setback. Onwards!
translation: 让我们忘掉这个小挫折吧，继续前进！

original: You take passage on a ship, but the crew is soon exposed as less than honorable. The captain is overheard discussing how he and his men will sell the pilgrims he is carrying, including you, into slavery at the next port!
translation: 你上了船，但很快发现船员十分无耻。你听到船长在和船员讨论将如何将船上的朝圣者在下一个港口卖到奴隶市场，包括你在内。

original: That will not come to pass. To arms!
translation: 这不会实现。准备战争！

original: We will sneak off the ship just before it docks...
translation: 我们会在船靠岸之前溜走的……

original: Mutiny!
translation: 哗变！

original: Together with the other pilgrims, you turn against the crew and a fierce struggle ensues. The battle ends when you run your blade through the treacherous captain's gut and the rest of the crew surrenders. The ship is under your command!
translation: 你和其他朝圣者一道，同船员们展开了激烈的战斗。当年你的剑刺穿奸诈船长的肠子以后，余下的船员投降了，现在，整只船在你的控制之下！

original: Set sail for Mecca!
translation: 起航去麦加！

original: You flee the ship.
translation: 你从船上逃走了。

original: As the ship approaches the port, you and your party quietly slip away into the water, and swim ashore some distance away from the docks as drenched but free men. The other pilgrims on the ship are not so fortunate...
translation: 当船靠岸时，你和你的同党悄悄地潜入水中，在远离码头的地方游上了岸，浑身湿透但获得了自由。船上的其他朝圣者就没那么幸运了……

original: At least now we can continue our journey.
translation: 至少我们现在可以继续旅途了。

original: You are fortunate to encounter a large, well-guarded caravan heading in the same direction as you. After joining with them you encounter several bandit groups as you journey forward, but they all scatter at the sight of the caravan, preferring instead to prey on smaller bands of pilgrims.
translation: 你很幸运地遇到了一大队同路的并有着良好守卫的旅行车队。加入他们后，前进的旅途中又遇到了几股强盗，但他们一看见车队就散了，他们更喜欢劫掠小规模的朝圣队伍。

original: Cowardly scum!
translation: 胆小的渣滓！

original: You are not far from your goal now, but you and your party are running short on water. A detour to a nearby oasis to replenish your supplies is necessary, but when you arrive it becomes obvious the well dried out many years ago...
translation: 你快到达目的地了，但你和你的同党已经快没有水了。一条通向绿洲的便道对你们来说是很需要的，但当你们到达绿洲时，才发现井已经干了很多年了……

original: We must have faith.
translation: 我们要有信心。

original: Haha... of course the well is dry...
translation: 哈哈……井当然是干的……

original: Sit down in prayer.
translation: 坐下来祷告。

original: As you sit down in prayer, you spot another caravan far away in the distance. Though you suspect it may be another mirage, you decide to follow it and they eventually lead you to the real oasis, slightly southeast of where you thought it would be.
translation: 当你坐下来祷告时，你认出不远处有另一支队伍。虽然你怀疑那只是海市蜃楼，但你们还是决定跟随他们，结果他们把你们带到了真正的绿洲，就在你先前认为的绿洲所在地的东南一点的位置。

original: Allah be praised!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: Give in to despair.
translation: 已经绝望了。

original: Overcome with anger and despair, you pick up a large rock and throw it in a rage over the crest of a nearby dune. A loud scream is heard from the other side, and as you cross over the crest you find the real oasis, with glittering, crystal-clear water... and an unconscious bedouin.
translation: 经历了愤怒和绝望后，你捡起一块大石头奋力地扔过沙丘的顶端，却听到对面传来一声尖叫。你穿过去后才发现，那是一块有着清澈水源的真正的绿洲……旁边还有一个不省人事的贝都因人。

original: Well... who would have thought?
translation: 好吧……谁想的到呢？

original: The journey through the desert is long and arduous under the scorching sun. Suddenly a large tea house materializes into thin air before your very eyes, and the singing djinn who seems to own the establishment beckons you inside. Strangely, your travelling companions do not take notice of this stunning event.
translation: 在烈日下穿越沙漠是一场又长又危险的旅途。突然一座茶馆出现在你眼前，茶馆的拥有者——唱着歌的神明在召唤着你。奇怪的是，你的同伴像都没有注意到这件事似的。

original: A mirage... my mind is playing tricks on me.
translation: 海市蜃楼……我的精神在捉弄我。

original: Last one inside buys the first round of tea!
translation: 最后进去的人能买到第一轮的茶！

original: The camel one of your companions is riding on collapses on the sand with a grunt, never to rise again. You could take turns with your companion to ride on your camel, but that would slow you down, and the unforgiving sun would have to be endured a while longer...
translation: 你的一位同伴的骆驼踩在了崩塌的沙丘上，再也站不起来了。你可以回去让你的同伴和你共骑一个骆驼，但这样会减慢你们前进的速度，那就意味着得在烈日下被煎熬更长时间……

original: Here, use my mount for a while.
translation: 来，用我的坐骑。

original: Terrible luck, friend... see you in Mecca!
translation: 真不幸，朋友……麦加见！

original: As you draw closer to Mecca, you spot an almost endless baggage train belonging to another ruler who seems to have decided to bring all the luxuries of his court along with him on his pilgrimage. As you pass his carriage together with your party, the driver, unaware of your station, curses at you to get out of the way.
translation: 当你临近麦加时，你看见另一位统治者的长长的车队，此人似乎把他的全部家当都带来朝圣了。当你们经过他们时，他们的车夫没有认出你的身份，竟然诅咒你挡了他们的道。

original: We are all equal before Allah, friend...
translation: 安拉面前众生平等，朋友……

original: Your small party comes across a single robed figure surrounded by a group of angry bandits in the desert. Things could turn ugly unless you intervene...
translation: 你的小队在沙漠中遇到一个穿着长袍的人，他被一群愤怒的强盗包围着。如果你不干涉，那么事态可能会变得严峻起来……

original: Stand aside, brigands!
translation: 滚开，可恶的土匪！

original: It is no concern of ours.
translation: 这不关我们的事。

original: Save the robed figure.
translation: 救这位穿长袍的人。

original: A fierce melee ensues, and several of the brigands are cut down by the robed figure, who reveals himself to be an able fighter. After the rest are dealt with by your party, the robed man bows before you. He hands you a ring with a strange carved symbol, but before you can ask its meaning he takes off into the desert.
translation: 发生了一场凶猛的战斗，几个强盗被这个穿长袍的人杀死了，此人显然是名高手。强盗余党被你的随从清理完后，着袍人向你鞠了一躬。他给了你一枚雕有奇怪符号的戒指，正当你想问清楚符号的含义时，这人就迅速在沙漠中走远不见了。

original: How peculiar.
translation: 太罕见了。

original: As you ride through the desert on your way home, you pass the grim remains of another pilgrim caravan. Their bones have been picked clean by scavengers and it serves as a sobering reminder of the dangers associated with the Hajj. You consider yourself lucky to have made it as far as you have.
translation: 当你穿越沙漠往回赶时，你经过了另一支朝圣者队伍的残骸。他们的肉早已被动物啃干净，残骸已成了麦加朝觐路上提醒人们此一路有多危险的标志。你很庆幸自己这一路都走过来了。

original: We will soon be home, Insha'Allah.
translation: 我们快到家了，感谢安拉。

original: While journeying home, you are caught in the open desert by a terrible sandstorm. You are forced to seek shelter behind a small rock outcropping to shield yourself from the wind. Taking comfort in your faith after visiting Mecca, you spend the night in prayer. As dawn arrives, you feel almost invigorated.
translation: 在你回家的旅途中，你在广阔的沙漠中遇到了可怕地沙尘暴。你被迫在一块岩石后面寻找庇护以逃避风沙。在麦加朝圣之后你的信仰得到了慰藉，你整个晚上都在祈祷。黎明到来之后，你感到精疲力竭。

original: I will remember this night.
translation: 我会记住这个夜晚的。

original: You catch up with some fellow pilgrims who are also returning home from the Hajj. They have been beset by bandits who have stolen everything but their clothes and left them with no means to continue the journey.
translation: 你遇到一些和你一样朝觐之后准备回家的人。他们除了衣服之外所有东西都被土匪抢走了，以至于他们根本无法继续旅行。

original: Here. This should be enough to see you safely home.
translation: 拿着，这些应该足够你们回到家了。

original: Sorry, but I cannot afford to dally. Best of luck to you.
translation: 很遗憾，我无能为力。祝你们好运。

original: You are ambushed by brigands as you move through the desert on your way home, and though your party cuts down several of their number, there are simply too many. They surround you and advance with twisted grins and drawn weapons. Things look bleak indeed...
translation: 你在回家路上途径的沙漠中被土匪袭击了，虽然你们杀了几个，但是他们依然人数众多。他们包围了你们，挂着扭曲的笑容举着粗陋的武器冲了过来。事情看起来不太妙……

original: Come then. I will sell myself dearly...
translation: 来吧。我会让你们付出代价的……

original: You make your last stand...
translation: 你做出了你最后的抵抗……

original: A strange whistle is heard and the air is suddenly filled with flying daggers and arrows. Robed figures seem to rise out of the sand and the air becomes heavy with dust. When it settles, the bandits lie dead on the ground. One of the robed men takes the strange ring you were given earlier, saying with a smile: "The Hashshashin always repay their debts, friend."
translation: 你听到了一些奇怪的声音，不久空中飞舞着匕首和飞箭。穿着长袍的人从沙漠地下窜了出来，空中尘土飞扬。当一切尘埃落定，土匪都倒在了地上，他们死了。其中一个拿起之前给你的奇怪的戒指，微笑着说：「阿萨辛派有债必偿，朋友。」

original: Then consider the debt repaid in full.
translation: 已经两清了。
